item.title: 全球市场监督机构建议加强对证券交易所的监管
item.description: 全球证券监管机构国际证监会组织（IOSCO）周四就监管机构应如何更密切地监督证券交易所以抵御商业行为变化带来的风险提出了详细的指导意见。【原文：Global securities watchdog IOSCO on Thursday proposed detailed guidance on how regulators should supervise stock exchanges more closely to negate risks from changes in business practices.】

item.title: 日本股市创六个月来最大单周外资流出量
item.description: 上周，外国投资者从日本股市撤资逾万亿日元，原因是部分股票除息，以及对日本央行干预汇市的预期导致近期反弹后的获利回吐。【原文：Foreign investors pulled more than a trillion yen out of Japanese stocks last week, as some stocks went ex-dividend and expectations of currency market intervention by the Bank of Japan led to profit booking after a recent rally.】

item.title: 野村高管表示，野村的目标是在 5-10 年内将美国信贷投资组合规模提升至 500 亿美元
item.description: 日本顶级投资银行野村控股的美国资产管理主管表示，野村控股的目标是在 10 年内将其美国信贷投资组合扩大到 500 亿美元，并可能寻求小型收购以加强其私人信贷业务。【原文：Nomura Holdings aims to expand its U.S. credit portfolio to $50 billion within 10 years and may seek small acquisitions to beef up its private credit business, the top Japanese investment bank's U.S. asset management chief said.】

item.title: 最大工会组织称日本企业同意将工资提高 5.24
item.description: 日本最大的工会组织 Rengo 周四表示，一些日本公司已同意今年将工资提高 5.24%。【原文：A group of Japanese firms have agreed to raise wages by 5.24% this year, the country's largest union group Rengo said on Thursday.】

item.title: 印尼政府称 SpaceX 申请印尼互联网服务提供商许可
item.description: 印度尼西亚通信部周四表示，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 SpaceX 公司已向印尼政府申请为其 Starlink 卫星设备颁发互联网服务提供商许可证。【原文：Elon Musk's SpaceX has applied to Indonesia's government for an internet service provider permit for its Starlink satellite unit, the communications ministry said on Thursday.】

item.title: 沃尔沃汽车三月份销量同比增长 25
item.description: 总部位于瑞典的沃尔沃汽车集团周四在一份声明中说，3 月份的销量比去年同期增长了 25%，达到 78,970 辆，创下了单月全球销量的历史新高。【原文：Volvo Cars' sales rose 25% in March from a year earlier to 78,970 cars, reaching an all-time high for global sales in a single month, the Sweden-based group said in a statement on Thursday.】

item.title: 投资者考虑美国降息时间表，亚洲外汇市场坚挺
item.description: 路透社周四的一项民意调查显示，投资者增加了对亚洲新兴货币的空头头寸，对印尼盾的看跌押注大幅跳升，因为在美联储降息时间表存在不确定性的情况下，美元依然坚挺。【原文：Investors raised short positions on emerging Asian currencies, with bearish bets on the Indonesian rupiah jumping sharply, as the U.S. dollar remained resilient amid uncertainty over the timeline of the Federal Reserve's interest rate cuts, a Reuters poll showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称韩国央行考虑全面调整前瞻性指引
item.description: 四位熟知内情的消息人士称，韩国央行正在考虑通过延长时间框架和提供直观估算来彻底改变其就未来可能的利率走势提供指导的方式，以提高透明度。【原文：The Bank of Korea is considering overhauling how it provides guidance on the likely future path of interest rates by extending the timeframe and giving visual estimates in a bid to boost transparency, said four sources familiar with the issue.】

item.title: Entain 主席 Barry Gibson 将于 9 月底卸任
item.description: 体育博彩和游戏集团 Entain 周四表示，主席 Barry Gibson 将在任职四年多后于 9 月底卸任，但如果集团任命了首席执行官，他有可能提前卸任。【原文：Sports betting and gaming group Entain said on Thursday Chair Barry Gibson would step down by September-end after more than four years in the role, although could potentially leave earlier if a CEO gets appointed for the group.】

item.title: 香港长江资产及其他公司表示对与越南银行欺诈案有关的房产感兴趣
item.description: 写给法院的信件显示，香港开发商长江资产控股公司和其他一些外国投资者对与越南最大金融欺诈案有关的价值数十亿美元的房产表示了兴趣。【原文：Hong Kong developer CK Asset Holdings and some other foreign investors have expressed interest in properties worth billions of dollars linked to Vietnam's biggest financial fraud, letters written to a court showed.】

item.title: 耶伦在中国产能过剩问题上面临艰难抉择
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）周四抵达中国南方工厂中心广州，向中国官员发出了一个强硬的信息：你们生产了太多的东西，尤其是清洁能源产品，而世界无法吸收这些产品。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen arrives in China's southern factory hub of Guangzhou on Thursday with a tough message to Chinese officials: you're producing too much of everything, especially clean energy goods, and the world can't absorb it.】

item.title: 日本柯尼卡美能达将裁员 2400 人，支出 1.32 亿美元
item.description: 日本柯尼卡美能达公司（Konica Minolta）周四表示，作为结构改革的一部分，该公司将在本财年内在全球裁员 2400 人。【原文：Japan's Konica Minolta said on Thursday it will trim 2,400 jobs worldwide during the current fiscal year as part of structural reform.】

item.title: 日本央行下调对日本 9 个地区中 7 个地区的经济评估
item.description: 日本央行周四下调了对该国九个地区中七个地区的经济评估，但表示这些地区的经济大多正在回升或逐步复苏。【原文：The Bank of Japan cut its economic assessment for seven of the country's nine regions on Thursday, but said the economies were mostly picking up or recovering gradually.】

item.title: 货币市场正处于冰冻期。降息和特朗普可能会使其解冻
item.description: 交易员和投资者正期待着全球降息和激烈的美国大选能将全球货币市场从近四年来最低迷的状态中拽出来。【原文：Traders and investors are looking to global interest rate cuts and a closely-fought U.S. election to drag the world's currency markets from their deepest lull in almost four years.】

item.title: 降息的不确定性令美国政府债券市场摇摆不定
item.description: 强劲的经济数据和对持续通胀的担忧促使投资者重新评估美联储今年降息的幅度，从而加剧了美国政府债券市场的疲软。【原文：Strong economic data and worries over sticky inflation are pushing investors to reassess how deeply the Federal Reserve will be able to cut interest rates this year, fueling weakness in the U.S. government bond market.】

item.title: 前外汇外交官渡边表示，除非日元跌破 155，否则日本不会进行干预
item.description: 日本前最高货币外交官渡边宏（Hiroshi Watanabe）周四表示，除非日元兑美元汇率跌破155，否则日本当局可能不会干预货币市场。【原文：Japanese authorities likely won't intervene in the currency market unless the yen plunges below 155 to the dollar, former top currency diplomat Hiroshi Watanabe said on Thursday.】

item.title: 早间竞价：日元下跌，美元除外
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: 拉美航空董事会同意启动股票在纽约证券交易所重新上市的程序
item.description: 拉塔姆航空公司（LATAM Airlines）周三表示，其董事会已批准启动美国存托凭证在纽约证券交易所重新上市的程序。【原文：LATAM Airlines on Wednesday said its board has given approval to begin the process of re-listing American Depositary Receipts on the New York Stock Exchange.】

item.title: 日元走低，日经指数领涨亚洲；大宗商品受追捧
item.description: 亚洲股市周四反弹，原因是美国仍在降息，尽管降息的时间尚不明确，而日元对除美元以外的所有货币的汇率都在下滑，并提振了日本股市。【原文：Asian shares rallied on Thursday as U.S. rate cuts remained on the menu, even if their timing was unclear, while the yen slid against everything except the dollar and boosted Japanese stocks.】

item.title: 美元在美国就业数据公布前稍事喘息
item.description: 周四，在等待美国劳动力市场最新数据的同时，交易员们认为美联储主席鲍威尔的讲话对今年降息的可能性起到了安抚作用，美元因此跌至近期高点下方。【原文：The dollar was pinned beneath recent peaks on Thursday with traders taking remarks from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell as reassuring on the likelihood of interest rate cuts this year while waiting for the latest U.S. labour market readout.】

item.title: Twilio 将寻求股东批准新的董事会董事任期
item.description: 云通信公司 Twilio 周三表示，将在即将召开的年度会议上寻求股东批准，将董事会董事任期从三年改为一年。【原文：Cloud communications company Twilio said on Wednesday it will seek shareholder approval at its upcoming annual meeting to change its board director terms to one year from three.】

item.title: 油价因担心供应减少和美国经济增长迹象而上涨
item.description: 周四亚市早盘，油价上涨，原因是市场担心主要产油国继续减产会导致供应减少，而且有迹象表明全球最大的石油消费国美国的经济增长将更加强劲。【原文：Oil prices rose in early Asian trade on Thursday on concerns of lower supply as major producers are keeping output cuts in place and on signs of stronger economic growth in the U.S., the world's biggest oil consumer.】

item.title: 市场推迟对美联储降息的押注，美元将保持强势：路透调查
item.description: 路透社调查的外汇策略师认为，随着金融市场继续推后对美联储降息时间和幅度的预期，美元在未来几个月将保持强势。【原文：The U.S. dollar will remain strong over the coming months as financial markets continue to push back on expectations for the timing and magnitude of Federal Reserve interest rate cuts, according to foreign exchange strategists polled by Reuters.】

item.title: 电信业反对美国恢复网络中立规则的计划
item.description: 美国电信业反对联邦通信委员会恢复具有里程碑意义的网络中立规则的计划，这些规则在唐纳德-特朗普总统执政期间于 2017 年被废除。【原文：The U.S. telecom industry opposes the Federal Communications Commission plan to reinstate landmark net neutrality rules that were repealed in 2017 under President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 吉林斯基集团和其他公司收到收购 22.48%努特雷斯塔股份的要约--股票交易所
item.description: Grupo Gilinski、Graystone Holdings、Grupo SURA 和 Grupo Argos 在一次公开股票发行中获得了哥伦比亚食品生产商 Grupo Nutresa 22.48% 的股份。【原文：Grupo Gilinski, Graystone Holdings, Grupo SURA and Grupo Argos got offers for 22.48% of Colombian food producer Grupo Nutresa in a public share offering, the stock exchange said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 用户使用的多项苹果服务瘫痪
item.description: 据该公司的状态页面显示，包括 App Store、Apple TV+ 和 Apple Music 在内的多项苹果服务在周三都出现了故障。【原文：Multiple Apple services, including the App Store, Apple TV+ and Apple Music, were down on Wednesday, according to the company's status page.】

item.title: 花旗、摩根大通、加拿大皇家银行将在与纽约市的交易中提供新的气候指标
item.description: 花旗集团、摩根大通和加拿大皇家银行（RBC）将根据纽约市审计长布拉德-兰德（Brad Lander）与北美三大银行达成的协议披露一项新的气候指标。【原文：Citigroup , JPMorgan and Royal Bank of Canada (RBC) will disclose a new climate metric under agreements between New York City Comptroller Brad Lander and the three large North American banks.】

item.title: 跨山公司扩建后的管道系统将于 5 月 1 日开始运行
item.description: 加拿大跨山公司周三表示，该公司扩建后的石油管道系统将于 5 月 1 日开始商业运营。【原文：Trans Mountain's expanded oil pipeline system will start commercial operations on May 1, the Canadian company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 黑莓因网络安全服务需求而意外盈利
item.description: 加拿大黑莓公司（BlackBerry）周三公布的第四季度财报显示，由于网络犯罪和高知名度黑客攻击事件增多，对其网络安全服务的需求增加，该公司第四季度意外盈利。【原文：Canada's BlackBerry reported a surprise profit for the fourth quarter on Wednesday, helped by higher demand for its cybersecurity services amid growing online crimes and high-profile hacks.】

item.title: 蔻驰起诉 Gap 出售 "蔻驰 "T恤衫
item.description: 奢侈品手袋制造商蔻驰公司周三起诉盖普公司，指控该零售商的 Old Navy 部门非法销售印有 "蔻驰 "字样的 T 恤衫。【原文：Luxury handbag maker Coach sued Gap on Wednesday, accusing the retailer's Old Navy unit of illegally selling T-shirts emblazoned with the word "Coach."】
